trans-unit.source: Represents a view for grouping, sorting, filtering, and navigating a data collection.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于对数据集合进行分组、排序、筛选和导航的视图。

trans-unit.source: You should not create objects of this class in your code.
trans-unit.target: 不应在代码中创建此类的对象。

trans-unit.source: To create a collection view for a collection that only implements <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, create a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> object, add your collection to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A> property, and get the collection view from the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.View%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建一个集合，其中仅实现的集合视图<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>，创建<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>对象，将添加到你的集合<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.Source%2A>属性，并获取从查看集合<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.View%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can think of a collection view as a layer on top of a binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself.
trans-unit.target: 可以将集合视图视为绑定源集合，可用于导航和显示基于排序、 筛选和分组查询，而无需操作基础源集合本身所有的集合的一个层。

trans-unit.source: If the source collection implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged> interface, the changes that raise the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event are propagated to the views.
trans-unit.target: 如果源集合实现<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged>接口，所引发的更改<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件传播到视图的视图。

trans-unit.source: Because a view does not change the underlying source collection, a source collection can have multiple views associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 视图不会更改基础源集合，因为源集合可具有与之关联的多个视图。

trans-unit.source: By using views, you can display the same data in different ways.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用视图，你可以在不同的方式显示相同的数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use two views on a collection of `Task` objects to show tasks sorted by priority on one part of the page and grouped by area on another part of the page.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以使用两个视图的集合的`Task`要显示的任务对象按优先级别的页的一个部分排序，并按在页面上的另一个部分区域分组。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications, all collections have an associated default collection view.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序，所有集合都具有关联的默认集合视图。

trans-unit.source: Rather than working with the collection directly, the binding engine always accesses the collection through the associated view.
trans-unit.target: 而不是直接使用集合，绑定引擎始终通过关联的视图访问集合。

trans-unit.source: To get the default view, use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的默认视图，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: An internal class based on <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> is the default view for collections that implement only <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: 内部类基于<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>是仅为实现的集合的默认视图<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> is the default view for collections that implement <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> 是实现的集合的默认视图<xref:System.Collections.IList>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> is the default view for collections that implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> 是实现的集合的默认视图<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingListView>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList>。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can create a view of your collection in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> class and then bind your control to that view.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以创建你的集合中的视图[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>类，然后将控件绑定到该视图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> class is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>类是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]表示形式<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>类。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅[How to： 排序和组数据使用 XAML 中的一个视图](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅"绑定到集合"[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: To set a view in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置视图[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> class, and it exposes the most commonly used members of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionViewSource> 是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]表示形式<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>类，并公开最常使用的成员<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>类。

trans-unit.source: The underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> class that represents a view of the specified collection.
trans-unit.target: 初始化表示指定集合视图的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> is bound to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread dispatcher of the caller of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>绑定到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]线程调度程序的此构造函数的调用方。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a thread other than the one that created the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> can change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SourceCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示创建的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> 线程能更改 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SourceCollection" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a thread other than the one that created the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> can change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SourceCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果除创建 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> 外的线程可更改 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SourceCollection" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the view supports filtering.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示视图是否支持筛选。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the view supports filtering; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果视图支持筛选，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property returns `false`, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A> property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性返回`false`，则设置<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A>属性引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the view supports grouping.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示视图是否支持分组。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to test whether the view supports sorting before adding <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.GroupDescriptions%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性可添加之前<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.GroupDescriptions%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes override this property to indicate whether they support grouping.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类重写此属性以指示它们是否支持分组。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the view supports sorting.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示视图是否支持排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to test whether the view supports sorting before adding <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性可添加之前<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes override this property to indicate whether they support sorting.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类重写此属性以指示其是否支持排序。

trans-unit.source: Clears any pending changes from the change log.
trans-unit.target: 从更改日志中清除所有挂起的更改。

trans-unit.source: Clears unprocessed changed to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除未处理更改为集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the view has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在视图更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that you can use to compare items in the view.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用于比较视图中的项的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> object that you can use to compare items in the view.
trans-unit.target: 可用于比较视图中的项的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IComparer" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item belongs to the view.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示指定项是否属于视图。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item belongs to the view; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果项属于视图，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method does not make any assumptions about whether the item belongs to the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会不进行任何假设项是否属于基础集合。

trans-unit.source: If the caller knows that the item belongs to the underlying collection, it is more efficient to call the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.PassesFilter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用方知道该项属于基础集合，它会更加高效调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.PassesFilter%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of records in the view.
trans-unit.target: 获取视图中的记录数。

trans-unit.source: The number of records in the view, or –1 if the number of records is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 视图中的记录数，或 –1（如果记录数未知）。

trans-unit.source: If a filter is set, this property value only includes items that pass the filter.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置筛选器，此属性的值仅包括传递的筛选器的项。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying collection is of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, this is an O(N) operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础集合的类型是<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>，这是一项 o （n） 操作。

trans-unit.source: This value is cached until the collection changes.
trans-unit.target: 集合更改之前，此值将缓存。

trans-unit.source: When deriving from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" />, override this property to provide a more efficient implementation.
trans-unit.target: 从派生时<see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" />，重写此属性以提供更有效的实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture information to use during sorting.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置排序期间使用的区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: The culture information to use during sorting.
trans-unit.target: 排序期间使用的区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: Raise this event after changing the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 更改后引发此事件<see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> is changing.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 正在更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Raise this event before changing the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 在更改之前引发此事件<see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current item in the view.
trans-unit.target: 获取视图中的当前项。

trans-unit.source: The current item of the view.
trans-unit.target: 视图中的当前项。

trans-unit.source: By default, the first item of the collection starts as the current item.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该集合的第一项作为当前项启动。

trans-unit.source: Collection views support the concept of a current record pointer.
trans-unit.target: 集合视图支持当前的记录指针的概念。

trans-unit.source: As you navigate through the objects in a collection view, you are moving a record pointer that allows you to retrieve the object that exists at that particular location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 浏览集合视图中的对象时，你在移动一个记录指针，它允许您检索存在于集合中的特定位置的对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that moving the current record pointer has some interactions with any sorting or filtering that is applied to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，将当前记录指针移有任何排序或筛选与某些交互操作应用于集合中。

trans-unit.source: Sorting preserves the current record pointer on the last record selected, but the collection view is restructured around it.
trans-unit.target: 排序保留当前记录指针上的最新记录选择，但集合视图是围绕重构它。

trans-unit.source: (Perhaps the selected record was at the beginning of the list before, but now the selected record might be somewhere in the middle.) Filtering preserves the selected record if that selection remains in view after the filtering.
trans-unit.target: （所选的记录可能已在之前，列表的开头，但现在所选的记录可能在中间的某个位置。）如果所选内容视图中筛选后，仍然筛选保留所选的记录。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the current record pointer is set to the first record of the filtered collection view.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将当前记录指针设置为筛选的集合视图的第一个记录。

trans-unit.source: The current item of the collection is bound to automatically if the target of a binding is a singleton value.
trans-unit.target: 集合的当前项绑定到自动如果绑定的目标是单一实例值。

trans-unit.source: If the target is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, the current item is synchronized with the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，与所选的项同步的当前项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a list box is bound to a collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A> is synchronized with the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一个列表框绑定到一个集合，<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A>与当前所选的项同步。

trans-unit.source: Only classes that pass currency handling calls to another internal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> object should override this property; all other derived classes should use the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SetCurrent(System.Object,System.Int32)" /> method to update the current values stored in the base class.
trans-unit.target: 传递处理对另一个内部调用的货币的类<see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" />对象应重写此属性; 所有其他派生的类应使用<see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SetCurrent(System.Object,System.Int32)" />方法来更新存储在基类中的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ordinal position of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> within the (optionally sorted and filtered) view.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 在（可能经过排序和筛选）视图中的序号位置。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> within the (optionally sorted and filtered) view.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 在（可能经过排序和筛选）视图中的序号位置。

trans-unit.source: Only classes that pass currency handling calls to another internal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> object should override this property; all other derived classes should use the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SetCurrent(System.Object,System.Int32)" /> method to update the current values stored in the base class.
trans-unit.target: 传递处理对另一个内部调用的货币的类<see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" />对象应重写此属性; 所有其他派生的类应使用<see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SetCurrent(System.Object,System.Int32)" />方法来更新存储在基类中的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.
trans-unit.target: 进入延迟循环，该循环可用于将更改合并到视图并延迟自动刷新。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于释放调用对象的 <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope.
trans-unit.target: 典型用法就是创建`using`作用域与此方法，然后将多个视图更改调用放在范围内。

trans-unit.source: This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.
trans-unit.target: 这会延迟自动刷新，直到退出延迟循环循环。

trans-unit.source: Removes the reference to the underlying collection from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> 中移除对基础集合的引用。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to unsubscribe to events on the underlying collection and allow the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法来取消对基础集合上的事件订阅，并让<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>进行垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a method used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于确定某个项是否适合包含在视图中的方法。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that represents the method used to determine if an item is suitable for inclusion in the view.
trans-unit.target: 一个委托，表示用于确定某个项是否适合包含在视图中的方法。

trans-unit.source: Simpler implementations do not support filtering and throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 较简单的实现不支持筛选，并引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CanFilter%2A> property to test if filtering is supported before assigning this property with a non-null value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CanFilter%2A>属性以测试是否支持筛选以分配此属性与非 null 值之前。

trans-unit.source: The current implementation does not support filtering.
trans-unit.target: 当前实现不支持筛选。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用于枚举视图中的项的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于枚举视图中的项的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the item at the specified zero-based index in the view.
trans-unit.target: 检索视图中位于从零开始的指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: The item at the specified zero-based index in the view.
trans-unit.target: 视图中位于从零开始的指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: This method evaluates the index with any <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A> property values that are set on the view.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的计算结果的索引与任何<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A>视图设置的属性值。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying collection is of type <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>, this is an O(N) operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础集合的类型是<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>，这是一项 o （n） 操作。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于 0。

trans-unit.source: When deriving from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" />, override this method to provide a more efficient implementation.
trans-unit.target: 从派生时<see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" />，重写此方法以提供更有效的实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription" /> objects that describes how the items in the collection are grouped in the view.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription" /> 对象的集合，该集合描述集合中的项在视图中的分组方式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is always `null` because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> class does not support grouping over its underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值始终是`null`因为<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>类不支持对其基础集合的分组。

trans-unit.source: The derived classes <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> do support grouping.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>支持分组。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the top-level groups that is constructed based on the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.GroupDescriptions" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取顶级组的集合，该集合根据 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.GroupDescriptions" /> 属性构造而成。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is always `null` because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> class does not support grouping over its underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值始终是`null`因为<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>类不支持对其基础集合的分组。

trans-unit.source: The derived classes <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> do support grouping.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>支持分组。

trans-unit.source: The item to locate.
trans-unit.target: 要定位的项。

trans-unit.source: Returns the index at which the specified item is located.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定项所在的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The index at which the specified item is located, or –1 if the item is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 指定项所在的索引位置，或 -1（如果该项未知）。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns an index other than -1, it must always be true that view[index-1] < item <= view[index], where the comparisons are done using the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the view, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回而-1 索引，它必须始终为 true，该视图 [索引 1] < 项 < = 的视图 [index]，其中执行比较使用<xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>视图，如果存在的方法。

trans-unit.source: This particular behavior of the method is used by some <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged> event handlers to speed up reaction to insertion and deletion.
trans-unit.target: 此特定行为的方法使用一些<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged>事件处理程序来加快对插入和删除反应。

trans-unit.source: If the derived class does not override this method, a listener does a binary search using the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生的类不重写此方法，侦听器将执行二进制搜索使用<xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> of the view is beyond the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示视图的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 是否超出集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: Collection views support the concept of a current record pointer.
trans-unit.target: 集合视图支持当前的记录指针的概念。

trans-unit.source: As you navigate through the objects in a collection view, you are moving a record pointer that allows you to retrieve the object that exists at that particular location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 浏览集合视图中的对象时，你在移动一个记录指针，它允许您检索存在于集合中的特定位置的对象。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should avoid calling <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh" /> if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.IsRefreshDeferred" /> returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类应避免调用<see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh" />如果<see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.IsRefreshDeferred" />返回<see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the view needs to be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示视图是否需要刷新。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the view needs to be refreshed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果视图需要刷新，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates if the internal state of the view has changed and requires a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指示是否视图的内部状态发生更改，并需要<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A>方法调用。

trans-unit.source: The typical scenario is if a <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription> or similar has been added to the view while the view is in a deferred refresh cycle (see <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.DeferRefresh%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 典型情况是如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>或类似项已添加到视图时的视图是在延迟的刷新周期 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.DeferRefresh%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, no explicit call to <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A> is needed; as soon as the deferred refresh cycle ends, the view calls refresh automatically.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，不需要显式调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A>需要; 只要延迟的刷新周期结束，该视图将自动调用刷新。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that is in the collection to represent a new item.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中表示新项的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that is in the collection to represent a new item.
trans-unit.target: 集合中表示新项的对象。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView> has <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.NewItemPlaceholderPosition%2A> set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition.AtBeginning> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition.AtEnd>, the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A> is added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>实现<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView>具有<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.NewItemPlaceholderPosition%2A>设置为<xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition.AtBeginning>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition.AtEnd>、<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A>添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A> always appears in the collection; it does not participate in grouping, sorting, or filtering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A>始终出现在集合中; 它不参与分组、 排序或筛选。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A> cannot be the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A>不能为<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Methods that perform relative navigation, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToNext%2A>, skip the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 方法执行相对导航窗格中，如<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToNext%2A>，跳过<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToFirst%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToLast%2A> skip the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.NewItemPlaceholderPosition%2A> is set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition.AtBeginning> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition.AtEnd>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToFirst%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToLast%2A>跳过<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A>如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView.NewItemPlaceholderPosition%2A>设置为<xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition.AtBeginning>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.NewItemPlaceholderPosition.AtEnd>分别。

trans-unit.source: Methods that perform absolute navigation, such as <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToPosition%2A>, do nothing if the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A> would be the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 方法执行绝对导航窗格中，如<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.MoveCurrentToPosition%2A>，不执行任何操作如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.NewItemPlaceholder%2A>将<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the view can change which item is the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示视图是否可以更改作为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 的项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if a listener cancels the change; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果侦听器取消了更改，则为 <see langword="false" />；否则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.AllowsCrossThreadChanges" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.AllowsCrossThreadChanges" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> object that is added to the change log.
trans-unit.target: 添加到更改日志的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Called by the base class to notify the derived class that an <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> event has been posted to the message queue.
trans-unit.target: 由基类调用，以通知派生类 <see cref="E:System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged" /> 事件已发送到消息队列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="args" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="args" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> object to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给事件处理程序的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Take any sorting, filtering, or grouping criteria into consideration before calling this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 执行任何排序、 筛选或分组在调用此方法来引发之前考虑的条件<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The sender of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的发送方。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> object to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 要传递给事件处理程序的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method calls <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.ProcessCollectionChanged%2A> if it is on the correct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread dispatcher and has never been updated from a different thread, or posts the change to the dispatcher to process it on the correct thread.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.ProcessCollectionChanged%2A>是否位于正确[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程调度程序和已永远不会更新来自另一个线程，或将更改发送到正确的线程上对其进行处理的调度程序。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentChanging" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentChanging" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentChanging" /> event that is not cancelable.
trans-unit.target: 引发一个不可取消的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentChanging" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition%2A> to –1.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition%2A>为 – 1。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by collection changes that affect the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用的影响的集合更改<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Information about the event.
trans-unit.target: 有关事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentChanging" /> event with the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的参数引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentChanging" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Arguments of the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: 要引发事件的自变量。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged" /> event using the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的参数引发 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The item to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified item in the underlying collection belongs to the view.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示基础集合中的指定项是否属于视图。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified item belongs to the view or if there is not filter set on the collection view; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定项属于视图或未对集合视图设置筛选器，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Contains%2A> method, this method assumes that the specified item belongs to the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Contains%2A>方法，此方法假定指定的项属于基础集合。

trans-unit.source: This method takes filters into account.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将筛选器考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you use this method during collection-changed notifications to determine if the added or removed item requires processing.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你使用此方法在集合更改通知过程来确定是否添加或移除的项需要处理。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> object to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, processes a single change on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 线程上的单个更改。

trans-unit.source: This method must be overridden in a derived class to process a single change on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: 必须在处理单个更改派生的类中重写此方法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]线程。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that all pending changes to the collection have been committed.
trans-unit.target: 确保此集合的所有待定更改都已被提交。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Re-creates the view.
trans-unit.target: 重新创建视图。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.GroupDescriptions%2A> property; a refresh occurs.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Filter%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SortDescriptions%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.GroupDescriptions%2A>属性; 刷新时发生。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to call the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A> method immediately after you set one of those properties.
trans-unit.target: 无需调用<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh%2A>方法之后，请立即设置这些属性之一。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to delay automatic refresh, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.DeferRefresh%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何延迟自动刷新的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.DeferRefresh%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes use the protected <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.RefreshOverride%2A> method to override the behavior of this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类使用受保护<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.RefreshOverride%2A>方法重写此方法的行为。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the view or specifies that the view needs to be refreshed when the defer cycle completes.
trans-unit.target: 刷新视图或指定视图在延迟循环完成后需要刷新。

trans-unit.source: Re-creates the view.
trans-unit.target: 重新创建视图。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should override this method to change the behavior of the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类应重写此方法可以更改的行为<see cref="M:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Refresh" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current item of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> 的当前项。

trans-unit.source: The item to set as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 的项。

trans-unit.source: The value to set as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition" /> 属性值的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified item and index as the values of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 将指定项和索引设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The item to set as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 的项。

trans-unit.source: The value to set as the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition" /> 属性值的值。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView" /> 中的项数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified item and index as the values of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 将指定项和索引设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentItem" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CurrentPosition" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This method can be called from a constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 可以从派生类的构造函数中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Call this overload from constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 从派生类的构造函数中调用此重载。

trans-unit.source: Do not pass the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Count%2A> property, which is a virtual property, as `count`.
trans-unit.target: 不要将传递<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.Count%2A>属性，它是虚拟的属性，作为`count`。

trans-unit.source: Instead, pass the count of the internal <xref:System.Collections.IList> that represents the collection.
trans-unit.target: 相反，传递的内部计数<xref:System.Collections.IList>表示的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SetCurrent%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.SetCurrent%2A> 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription" /> structures that describes how the items in the collection are sorted in the view.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription" /> 结构的集合，该集合描述集合中的项在视图中的排序方式。

trans-unit.source: An empty <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为空 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.SortDescriptionCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription> to the returned (empty) collection because the base class <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView> does not support sorting.
trans-unit.target: 无法添加<xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>所返回的 （空） 集合因为基类<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView>不支持排序。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the derived classes <xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView> that do support sorting.
trans-unit.target: 请改用派生的类<xref:System.Windows.Data.ListCollectionView>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingListCollectionView>支持排序。

trans-unit.source: Also, check the <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CanSort%2A> property before adding or removing <xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription> objects to avoid an exception.
trans-unit.target: 另外，请检查<xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CanSort%2A>之前添加或删除属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.SortDescription>对象以避免异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying unfiltered collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回未筛选的基础集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> object that is the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示基础集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用于枚举视图中的项的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that you can use to enumerate the items in the view.
trans-unit.target: 一个可用于枚举视图中的项的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether it has been necessary to update the change log because a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" /> notification has been received on a different thread without first entering the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否必须更新更改日志，因为在没有先进入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 线程调度程序的情况下，已在其他线程上收到 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" /> 通知。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if it has been necessary to update the change log because a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" /> notification has been received on a different thread without first entering the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread dispatcher; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果它已更新更改日志，因为所需<see cref="E:System.Windows.Data.CollectionView.CollectionChanged" />通知的安全提供程序已在另一个线程收到而无需第一个输入[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]线程调度程序; 否则为<see langword="false" />。
